means: 不够标准的，在标准以下的

sentence.Network_en: The cold has made already substandard living conditions even worse.
sentence.Network_cn: 寒冷使得已经较差的生活环境变得更糟糕。

sentence.Network_en: Too many families are still living in substandard housing.
sentence.Network_cn: 仍有太多家庭居住条件达不到标准.

sentence.Network_en: The reputation of the firm was blown upon for passing substandard products off as first - class merchandise.
sentence.Network_cn: 该公司因把次品当正品出售而名誉扫地.

Such acts only substandard social ethics , but also in violation of laws and regulations ., 这种行为不仅不合社会伦理 , 也违反了法律法规.

entry.tran: 不够标准的;不合格的;差劲的;劣质的
entry.def: A sub-standard service or product is unacceptable because it is below a required standard.

example.ex: Residents in general are poor and undereducated, and live in sub-standard housing.
example.tran: 居民们普遍都很贫穷，受教育程度低，居住条件较差。

means.word_mean: 1. falling short of some prescribed norm;

auth_sentence.content: We found this work to be substandard and dangerous.
auth_sentence.res_content: We found this work to be substandard and dangerous.

auth_sentence.content: More than half the medicines received were substandard or counterfeit.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: More than half the medicines received were substandard or counterfeit.

auth_sentence.content: It is also wrong to suggest Medicaid involves substandard health care.
